pages.text: Miss Meiling always want to eat some traditional chinese food in my restaurant. She likes to eat some hot tofu cuisine, so I make mapo tofu for her.
tofu, the soul of mapo tofu!$(br)some minced beef, it is different from traditional mapo tofu$(br)salt, or it will be boring$(br)Chili pepper, because mapo tofu is hot!$(br)You need a wok and patient
Some spider will carry tofu, you can get tofu from them!
